summary: 3PL call TPS to update pickup stops
description: 3PL call TPS to update pickup stops

query.name: status
query.description:
1. planned: when stop is dispatched to courier
 2. arrived: when driver arrived at stop and start pickup
 3. finished: when driver finished pickup at the stop
 4. skipped: when driver selected to skip the stop due to some reason
 5. removed: when the stop has 0 RTS

query.name: statusUpdateTime
query.description: actual process time when reaching the status

query.name: eta
query.description: when the ETA is updated, need to update the data to Lazada side, scenario include: 1. without ETA >> with ETA 2. with ETA >> without ETA 3. ETA change from A to B

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/logistics/tps/runsheets/stops')
request.add_api_parameter("stopId", "Stop001")
request.add_api_parameter("sellerId", "200165961111")
request.add_api_parameter("warehouseCode", "dropshipping")
request.add_api_parameter("dopStationId", "SSG")
request.add_api_parameter("dopStationName", "Sai Gon")
request.add_api_parameter("pickupType", "Pickup")
request.add_api_parameter("status", "planned")
request.add_api_parameter("statusUpdateTime", "1659439136265")
request.add_api_parameter("dispatcherName", "Geralt")
request.add_api_parameter("dispatcherContact", "+841231231123")
request.add_api_parameter("driverId", "DriverX")
request.add_api_parameter("driverName", "John Wick")
request.add_api_parameter("driverContact", "+841231231124")
request.add_api_parameter("eta", "1659439136265")
request.add_api_parameter("successVolume", "10")
request.add_api_parameter("failedVolume", "1")
request.add_api_parameter("failedVolumeList", "[{\"volume\":\"1\",\"reason\":\"Seller closed\",\"type\":\"Failed\"}]")
response = client.execute(request)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

request = lazop.LazopRequest('/logistics/tps/runsheets/stops')
request.add_api_param('stopId', 'Stop001')
request.add_api_param('sellerId', '200165961111')
request.add_api_param('warehouseCode', 'dropshipping')
request.add_api_param('dopStationId', 'SSG')

request.add_api_param('driverName', 'John Wick')

request.add_api_param('eta', '1659439136265')
request.add_api_param('successVolume', '10')
request.add_api_param('failedVolume', '1')

response = client.execute(request)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
